subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Learning Milestones
description: A short lesson to help you apply Learning Milestones.

hook.text: Traditional startups measure progress by features shipped. Lean startups measure something different.

buildup.text: Learning milestones track validated learning: what did we believe, what did we test, what did we learn?

discovery.text: Instead of 'we built the login page,' the milestone is 'we proved 30% of users complete onboarding.'

twist.text: IMVU set a learning milestone to prove users would invite friends. When they didn't, it revealed a flaw.

climax.text: That single insight led them to redesign their entire growth strategyâ€”and it actually worked.

punchline.text: Progress isn't what you built. It's what you proved.
